Translations.Text: H
Nos non reveal Quran vos causa vos any hardship
Unus to remind the reverent
revelation ex Creator terra high caelum
The Multus Gracious; He assumed totus authority
To Eum belongs everything caelum terra everything them everything ground
(Vos declare tuus convictions non) He knows secret quod et hidden
DEUS ibi NON est ALIUS DEUS EUM. To Eum belong the multus beautiful cognomen
Vos noted history Moses
When he vide fire he dictus to his familia Stay hic. Ego vide fire Maybe ego bring vos some de it invenit some guidance fire
When he advenit it he est alias O Moses
Ego est tuus Dominus; remove tuus sandals! Vos est sanctus valley Tuwaa
Ego chosen vos ita listen to quod revealed
Ego est DEUS; ibi non est alius deus Me. Vos worship Me alone observe Contact Prayers (Salat) remember Me
Hora (finis de saeculum) surely advenit; ego keep it fere hidden each anima est paid pro its works
Non diverted therefrom de those non believe in it - those pursue their suus opinions - lest vos fall
Quod est hoc in tuus rectus manus Moses
He dictus Hoc est my staff Ego lean it herd my sheep it ego use it alius purposes
He dictus Throw it down Moses
He threw it down whereupon it turned into moving serpent
He dictus Pick it non est afraid! Nos return it its original dictus
Ac habuit tuus manus tuus wing it advenit albus blemish alias proof
Nos sic show vos some de noster major portents
Iit Pharaoh he transgressed
He dictus My Dominus cool my temper
factus hoc matter easy me
Ac untie knot my tongue
Ita they understand my speech
Ac appoint adjutor me my familia
My frater Aaron
Strengthen me eum
Let eum est my partner in hoc matter
Ut nos glorify Vos frequently
Ac commemorate Vos frequently
Vos est Seer de nos
He dictus Tuus request granted O Moses
Nos beatus vos alias temporis
When nos revealed tuus mater quod nos revealed
Dictus Throw eum box tunc throw eum into river! river throw eum shore picked enemy de Meus enemy his. ' ego showered vos cum love Me ego habet vos factus My watchful eye

Tuus soror walked them dictus ‘ego tell vos nursing mater take bonus care de eum. ' Nos sic returned vos tuus mater ut she est happy stop injuria Ac when vos killed person nos saved vos grievous consequences; indeed nos tested vos thoroughly. Vos stayed annus people Midyan statim vos advenit prout precise plan
Ego factus vos just Me
Iit tuus frater supported de My signum non waver in remembering Me
Iit Pharaoh he transgressed
Speak to eum nicely; he take heed become reverent
They dictus Noster Dominus nos fear lest he attack nos transgress
He dictus est afraid ego est vos listening watching
Iit eum dictus ‘Nos est 2 messengers ex tuus Dominus! Let Infans Israel iit! Vos refrain ex persecuting them! Nos bring signum tuus Dominus pax est lot de those heed guidance
‘Nos inspired retribution inevitably afflict those disbelieve turn
He dictus Qui est tuus Dominus O Moses
He dictus Noster Dominus est 1 qui granted everything its existence its guidance
He dictus Quod de elapsus generations
He dictus knowledge thereof est my Dominus actum. My Dominus nunquam errs nor perfecit He forget
He est Unus factus terra habitable vos paved in it via vos. He sends down caelum aqua quae nos produce multus different generis plants
Eat levabat tuus livestock! These est sufficient proofs those possess intelligence
